item.title: Query sql server from powershell
item.description: sqlcmd utility (2019) Installed with Visual Studio 2019. (Apparently also with Sql Server 2019, but they dont’s explain WHERE it actually is :S) Add to path sqlcmd.exe is located in: Visual Studio 2019: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio\2019\Professional\Common7\IDE\Extensions\Microsoft\SQLDB\DAC\150 Run a script sqlcmd -S [SERVER] -i C:\setupscripts\createStockUser.sql -o C:\setupscripts\createStockUser.log # e.g. sqlcmd -S localhost -i C:\setupscripts\createUser.sql -o C:\setupscripts\createUser.log sqlserver powershell module Install-Module sqlserver -Force A minimun nuget version is required.
